name: A Squirrel's Apocalypse
description:
The Game:
You are a squirrel living in a post-apocalyptic world.
Your mission will be find a new forest to live.

Controls:
A -> Walk Left
S-> Walk Right
Space -> Jump 

Credits:
Player movement, tilemaping and camera movement based on Brackeys's tutorials.
Background Parallax Effect based on Code Monkey's tutorials.
Music by "Ultimate Game Music Collection" Unity Asset.

Code and Art by Enmanuel Valencia
https://twitter.com/Asdenmanuel
